author: Upper Echelon
description:
ARC Raiders, after a smashing release and a first week of growth, is a breakout success because of its incredible balance, intriguing gameplay loop, and wonderful accessibility. 

As some players argue about prioritizing certain aspects, I find myself consistently impressed by the creative choices of Embark, and looking forward to the content roadmap this game has in the future. 

Undoubtedly one of 2025's best games, and one of the most well developed Extraction shooters to date.
